extendedInfo.description: Put special days which mark the remarkbale occasions in your life in settings in advance, then it will indicate how far away till the special days coming, if it's past, it will also update automaticlly second by second.Widget support: you can add Countdown board widget to your desktopupdate log v1.1:- better widget

reviews.comment: Its cool....having more color options would be great. And also being able to to have a couple of countdowns going (I.e a wedding & a birthday)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Need to be able to countdown to more then one event. Very very basic app, but good if you have one special date in mind.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: No updates ever,huh? Cool beans. Uninstalling. Invisible on dark background. Needs a text color option - at least black/white.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does not display well, difficult to read. Countdown Widget is a better api.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: like...wish it ran off phones time or could set time zone hour off for me
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good idea, but i can barely see the widget, needs many more options... hope it gets fixed soon!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Option for different size Widgets, and Widgets need background to be readable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app works but not for darker backgrounds for that I suggest using countdown widget. Countdown widget allows you to view your countdown easier.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would be great is there was an actual timer showing the minutes tick away and color...if you have a dark background and the widget is black can\'t see
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice but wish it had option to put more countdowns, and hr n min entry
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The widget can be difficult to see on a multi colored background. But nice with a widget that only counts days.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like it.. but cant see widget on black background! also ya cant set the time! Blah!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Yes! Just what i was looking for! Simple and clean Only four stars because you can only have one event
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The time is off. At 2:00am the day still has not changed. It is useful except for the time being off.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not bad, but I set a date and the countdown shows x number of days and 15 minutes left, but it\'s 10:45, so for whatever reason it\'s off by an hour.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: As advertised, but needs seconds in widget and a much better UI.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very simple, works perfectly. One problem, can\'t see widget on black background!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good app - please update widget though. It is hard to read. Perhaps some larger bold text for the day and the rest still small?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Glad to have a days-only countdown. Wish i could have multiple dates. Needs either color choice or a solid tile behind it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great. It would be nice if I could change the widget font color
reviews.author: A Google User
